column17: Sapphire invented now commonly used Stainless Steel Hot Casserole way back in 1982 and has set milestone for the entire industry By purchasing Sapphire Products you can be rest assured of the quality Life and the working of the product Salient Features 1. At Sapphire we ensure that all the products we manufacture do not employ any child labour 2. 100% Environment/ Ozone Friendly CFC free P.U.F. Insulation Commonly known as Green Foam is used which is Imported from Japan & Korea 3. All Screws are made up of Stainless Steel and have been stud welded for a Trouble free operation 4. Sapphire has the maximum No. of design and sizes available to suit every requirement. 5. The First And Probably The Only Company In The World To Use The Latest No Hole Technology 6. Energy Saving Keeps Food Hot For Around 4-6 Hours. Hence There Is No Need Of Reheating Your Food Hence Avoiding The Wastage Of Costly L.P.G. & Electricity Thereby Reducing Your Expenses. 7. Keeps The Food Nutrient Rich Once The Reheating Is Avoided All The Nutrients Of Food Are Preserved. Ensuring You And Your Family Are In Best Of The Health. 8. No Joints In The Interior Part Of Our Stainless Steel Casserole In Local Plastic Thermo Wares The Joint Is Inside Due To Which Food Particles Tend To Stay In The Crevice And Thus Causing The Food Kept In Them Unhealthy To Eat And These Casseroles Also Starts Stinking After Some Time. Our No Joints Inside Technology Makes The Food Kept In It Healthy Apart From That Cleaning It Is Also Very Easy. 9. All Our Products Are Made From Virgin Raw Material And Food Grade Stainless Steel. 10. Strict Quality Control At Various Levels Ensures That The Products Are Of The Best Quality Possible. 11. The Best Compliment We Ever Got Was That Our Products Are Not Just Thermo Wares They Are Actually Health Wares.
